name: Repulsion Armor Plate
description: Reduce all incoming damage by 5 (+5 per stack). Cannot be reduced below 1.

name: Mocha
description: Increases attack speed by 7.5% (+7.5% per stack) and movement speed by 7% (+7% per stack).

name: Bolstering Lantern
description: Increase your attack speed by 7.5% for up to 4 (+2 per stack) enemies and allies within 20 (+5 per stack) meters.

name: Topaz Brooch
description: Gain a temporary barrier on kill for 15 health (+15 per stack).

name: Tougher Times
description: 15% (+15% per stack) chance to block incoming damage. Unaffected by luck.
unlock: Die 5 times.

name: Tri-Tip Dagger
description: 10% (+10% per stack) chance to bleed an enemy for 240% base damage.

name: Armor-Piercing Rounds
description: Deal an additional 20% damage (+20% per stack) to bosses.
unlock: Complete a Teleporter event.

name: Lens-Maker's Glasses
description: Your attacks have a 10% (+10% per stack) chance to Critically Strike, dealing double damage.

name: Crowbar
description: Deal 75% (+75% per stack) damage to enemies above 90% health.
unlock: Discover 10 unique white items.

name: Warped Echo
description: The next source of damage is reduced by 20% and spread into 3 (+1 per stack) hits. All echoed damage is non-lethal except for the final hit.Recharges every 15s.

name: Bundle of Fireworks
description: Activating an interactable launches 8 (+4 per stack) fireworks that deal 300% base damage.
unlock: Duplicate the same item 7 times in a row with a 3D printer.

name: Bison Steak
description: Increases maximum health by 25 (+25 per stack).

name: Delicate Watch
description: Increase damage by 20% (+20% per stack). Taking damage to below 25% health breaks this item.

name: Roll of Pennies
description: Gain 3 (+3 per stack) gold on taking damage from an enemy. Scales over time.

name: Cautious Slug
description: Increases base health regeneration by +3 hp/s (+3 hp/s per stack) while outside of combat.

name: Power Elixir
description: Taking damage to below 25% health consumes this item, healing you for 75% of maximum health.

name: Paul's Goat Hoof
description: Increases movement speed by 14% (+14% per stack).
unlock: Fail the Shrine of chance 3 times in a row.

name: Gasoline
description: Killing an enemy ignites all enemies within 12m (+4m per stack) for 150% base damage. Additionally, enemies burn for 150% (+75% per stack) base damage.

name: Chronic Expansion
description: Killing an enemy increases your damage by 3.5% (+1% per stack), up to 10 (+5 per stack), for 7s. Dealing damage refreshes the timer.

name: Medkit
description: 2 seconds after getting hurt, heal for 20 plus an additional 5% (+5% per stack) of maximum health.
unlock: Defeat an Elite-type monster.

name: Bustling Fungus
description: After standing still for 1 seconds create a zone that heals for 4.5% (+2.25% per stack) of your health every second to all allies within 3m (+1.5m per stack).

name: Focus Crystal
description: Increase damage to enemies withing 13m by 20% (+20% per stack).

name: Oddly-shaped Opal
description: Increase armor by 100 (+100 per stack) while out of danger.

name: Personal Shield Generator
description: Gain a shield equal to 8% (+8% per stack) of your maximum healt. Recharges outside of danger.

name: Item Scrap, White
description: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.

name: Backup Magazine
description: Add +1 (+1 per stack) charge of your Secondary skill.
unlock: Fully charge a Teleporter without getting hit.

name: Elusive Antlers
description: Spawns orbs of energy nearby every 10s (-10% per stack), giving +12% movement speed up to 3 (+1 per stack) times for 12s.

name: Energy Drink
description: Sprint speed is improved by 25% (+25% per stack).

name: Sticky Bomb
description: 5% (+5% per stack) chance on hit to attach a bomb to an enemy, detonating for 180% TOTAL damage.

name: Stun Grenade
description: 5% (+5% per stack) chance on hit to stun enemies for 2 seconds.

name: Soldier's Syringe
description: Increase Attack Speed by 15% (+15% per stack).

name: Monster Tooth
description: Killing an ennemy spawns a healing orb that heals for 8 plus an additional 2% (+2% per stack) of maximum health.

name: Rusted Key
description: A hidden cache containing an item (80%/20%) will appear in a random location on each stage. Opening the cache consumes this item.
unlock: Defeat the Teleporter boss under 15 seconds.

name: Warbanner
description: On level up or starting the Teleporter event, drop a banner that strengthens all allies within 16m (+8m per stack).Raise attack and movement speed by 30%.

name: Predatory Instincts
description: Critical Strikes increase attack speed by 12%.Maximum cap of 36% (+24% per stack) attack speed.
unlock: Reach +200% attack speed.

name: Bandolier
description: 18% (+10% per stack) chance on kill to drop an ammo pack that resets all s.

name: Ghor's Tome
description: 4% (+4% per stack) chance on kill to drop a treasure worth 25 gold. Scales over time.

name: Ukulele
description: 25% chance to fire a chain lightning for 80% TOTAL damage up to 3 (+2 per stack) targets within 20m (+2m per stack).

name: Death Mark
description: Enemies with 4 or more debuffs are marked for death, increasing damage taken by 50% from all sources for 7 (+7 per stack) seconds.

name: War Horn
description: Activating your Equipment gives you +70% attack speed for 8s (+4s per stack).
unlock: Complete 3 Combat Shrines in a single stage.

name: Fuel Cell
description: Hold an additional equipment charge +1. Reduce equipment cooldown by 15% (+15% per stack).
unlock: Pickup 5 different types of Equipment.

name: Old Guillotine
description: Instantly kill Elite Monsters below 13% (+13% per stack) health.
unlock: Defeat 500 Elite Monsters.

name: Will-O'-the-wisp
description: On killing an enemy, spawn a lava pillar in a 12m (+2.4m per stack) radius for 350% (+280% per stack) base damage.

name: Chance Doll
description: On Shrine of Chance success, 40% (+10% per stack) chance to get higher rarity items.

name: Prayer Beads
description: Grows in power by absorbing experience, storing 20% (+5% per stack) bonus stats (health, regeneration, and damage). On removal, gain all stored stats.

name: Hopoo Feather
description: Gain +1 (+1 per stack) maximum jump count.

name: Kjaro's Band
description: Hits that deals more than 400% damage also blasts enemies with a runic flame tornado, dealing 300% (+300% per stack) TOTAL damage over time. Recharges every 10 seconds.
unlock: Discover the hidden chamber in the Abandonned Aqueduct.

name: Shipping Request Form
description: A delivery containing 2 items (79%/20%/1%) will appear in a random location on each stage. (Increases rarity chances of the items per stack.)

name: Harvester's Scythe
description: Gain 5% critical chance.Critical strikes heal for 8 (+4 per stack) health.
unlock: Complete a Prismatic Trial.

name: Runald's Band
description: Hits that deals more than 400% damage also blasts enemies with a runic ice blast, slowing them by 80% for 3s (+3s per stack) and dealing 250% (+250% per stack) TOTAL damage. Recharge every 10 seconds.
unlock: Discover the hidden chamber in the Abandonned Aqueduct.

name: Luminous Shot
description: Activating secondary skill stores up to 5 charges +1. Requires 3 charges for your Primary skill to fire lightning stikres, dealing 175% TOTAL damage +50% each.Reduces Secondary skill  by 20%.

name: Infusion
description: Killing an enemy increases your health permanently by 1 (+1 per stack), up to a maximum of 100 (+100 per stack) health.
unlock: Defeat 3000 enemies.

name: Wax Quail
description: Jumping while sprinting boosts you forward by 10m (+10m per stack).
unlock: Reach +300% movespeed (include sprinting).

name: Breaching Fin
description: Grounded enemies hit with any skill are launched and stunned. Enemies hit while airborne are launched again up to 2 times (+1 per stack). Launched enemies take increased damage by 10% from all sources per launch. Recharges after 15s.

name: Sale Star
description: Gain an extra item on the first chest opened per stage. Each additional Sale Star increase the chance of getting more items by 5%.

name: AtG Missile Mk. 1
description: 10% chance to fire a missile that deals 300% (+300% per stack) TOTAL damage.

name: Hunter's Harpoon
description: Killing an enemy increases movement speed by 125%, fading over 1 (+0.5 per stack) seconds.

name: Old War Stealthkit
description: Falling below 25% health causes you to gain 40% movement speed and invisibility for 5s. Recharges every 30 seconds (-50% per stack).

name: Shuriken
description: Activation your Primary skill also throws a shuriken that deals 400% (+100% per stack) base damage. You can hold up to 3 (+1 per stack) shurikens which all reload over 10 seconds.

name: Regenerating Scrap
description: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with Uncommon 3D Printers. At the start of each stage, it regenerates.

name: Item Scrap, Green
description: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.

name: Leeching Seed
description: Dealing damage heals you for 1 (+1 per stack) health.

name: Chronobauble
description: Slow enemies for -60% movement speed for 2s (+2s per stack).

name: Rose Buckler
description: Increase armor by 30 (+30 per stack) while sprinting.

name: Red Whip
description: Leaving combat boosts movement speed by 30% (+30% per stack).

name: Squid Polyp
description: Activating an interactable summons a Squid Turret that attacks nearby enemies at 100% (+100% per stack) attack speed. Lasts 30 seconds.
unlock: Activate 6 turrets in a single run.

name: Ignition Tank
description: Ignite effects deal +300% (+300% per stack) more damage over time.

name: Lepton Daisy
description: Release a healing nova during the Teleporter event, healing all nearby allies for 50% of their maximum health. Occurs 1 (+1 per stack) times.

name: Unstable Transmitter
description: Falling below 25% health gives you a temporary barrier and a dimensional aura that bleeds and teleports away enemies for 8s.Enemies killed by the aura extend the duration by 1s.At the start of each stage, it regenerates.

name: Razorwire
description: Getting hit causes you to explode in a burst of razors, dealing 160% damage.Hits up to 5 (+2 per stack) targets in a 25m (+10m per stack) radius.

name: Noxious Thorn
description: Gain 10% chance to bleed an enemy. On killing an enemy, transfer 33% of every debuff stack to 1 enemy (+1 per stack) within 20m (+5m per stack).

name: Berzerker's Pauldron
description: Killing 4 enemies within 1 second sends you into a frenzy for 6s (+4s per stack). Increases movement speed by 50% and attack speed by 100%.
unlock: Charge the Teleporter with less than 10% health.

name: Alien Head
description: Reduce skill  by 25% (+25% per stack).

name: Shattering Justice
description: After hitting an enemy 5 times, reduce their armor by 60 for 8 (+8 per stack) seconds.

name: War Bonds
description: During boss events, 5 missiles bombard the area, dealing 2.5% (+2.5% per stack) of boss' Max Health in damage. Before the boss event, gain additional missiles, up to a maximum of 20 (+5 per stack), per 50 gold gained.Gold Requirement scales over time.

name: Aegis
description: Healing past full grants you a temporary barrier for 50% (+50% per stack) of the amount you healed.

name: Brilliant Behemoth
description: All your attacks explode in a 4m (+1.5m per stack) radius for a bonus 60% TOTAL damage to nearby enemies.

name: Growth Nectar
description: Grants 4% increase to ALL stats for each buff, up to a maximum of 4 (+4 per stack).

name: Sentient Meat Hook
description: 20% (+20% per stack) chance on hit to fire homing hooks at up to 10 (+5 per stack) enemies for 100% TOTAL damage.
unlock: Loop back to the first stage.

name: Defensive Microbots
description: Shoot down 1 (+1 per stack) projectiles within 20m every 0.5 seconds. Recharge rate scales with attack speed.

name: 57 Leaf Clover
description: All random effects are rolled +1 (+1 per stack) times for a favorable outcome.
unlock: Complete 20 stages in a single run.

name: Laser Scope
description: Critical Strikes deal an additional 100% damage (+100% per stack)

name: Ceremonial Dagger
description: Killing an enemy fires out 3 homing daggers that deal 150% (+150% per stack) base damage.

name: Spare Drone Parts
description: Gain Col. Droneman. Drones gain +50% (+50% per stack) attack speed and damage reduction. Drones gain 10% chance to fire a missile on hit, dealing 300% TOTAL damage. Drones gain an automatic chain gun that deals 6x100% damage, bouncing to 2 enemies.

name: Dio's Best Friend
description: Upon Death, this item will be consumed and you will return to life with 3 seconds of invulnerability.
unlock: Stay alive for 30 consecutive minutes.

name: H3AD-5T v2
description: Increase jump height. Creates a 5m-100m radius kinetic explosion on hitting the ground, dealing 1000%-10000% base damage that scales up with fall distance. Recharges in 10 (-50% per stack) seconds.

name: Happiest Mask
description: Killing enemies has a 7% chance to spawn a ghost of the killed enemy with 1500% damage. Lasts 30s (+30s per stack).

name: Wake of Vultures
description: Gain the power of any killed elite monster for 8s (+5s per stack).

name: Frost Relic
description: Killing an enemy surrounds you with an ice storm that deals 1200% damage per second and slows enemies by 80% for 1.5s. The storm grows with every kill, increasing it's radius by 2m .Stacks up to 18m (+12m per stack).

name: Ben's Raincoat
description: Prevents 1 (+1 per stack) debuff and instead grants a temporary barrier for 10% of maximum health. Recharges every 5 seconds.

name: Rejuvenation Rack
description: Heal +100% (+100% per stack) more.
unlock: Without healing, reach and complete the 3rd Teleporter event.

name: Sonorous Whispers
description: When a large monster is killed it will always drop an item. All elites have a 4% chance of dropping an item (+1% per stack).

name: Brainstalks
description: Upon killing an elite monster, enter a frenzy for 4s (+4s per stack) where skills have no cooldowns.
unlock: Defeat an Elite boss on Monsoon difficulty.

name: Resonance Disc
description: Killing 4 enemies in 7 seconds charges the Resonance Disc. The disc launches itself toward a target for 300% base damage (+300% per stack), piercing all enemies it doesn't kill, and then explodes for 1000% base damage +1000%.Returns to the user, striking all enemies along the way for 300% base damage (+300% per stack).

name: Runic Lens
description: 3% chance on hit to call a meteor strike, dealing 2000% base damage. Every 100% attack damage dealth increases the activation chance by 3% (+3% per stack) and damage by 150% (+50% per stack).

name: Pocket I.C.B.M
description: All missile items and equipments fire an additional 2 missiles. Increase missile damage by 0% (+50% per stack).

name: N'kuhana's Opinion
description: Store 100% (+100% per stack) of healing as Soul Energy. After your Soul Energy reaches 10% of your maximum health, fire a skull that deals 250% of your Soul Energy as damage.
unlock: Find the Altar to N'kuhana.

name: Symbiotic Scorpion
description: 100% chance on hit to reduce armor by 2 (+2 per stack) permanently.

name: Interstellar Desk Plant
description: On kill, plant a healing fruit seed that grows into a plant after 5 seconds.The plant heals for 10% of maximum health every second to all allies withing 5m (+5m per stack). Last 10 seconds.

name: Bottled Chaos
description: Trigger a random equipment effect 1 (+1 per stack) time(s).

name: Item Scrap, Red
description: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.

name: Unstable Tesla Coil
description: Fire out lightning that hits 3 (+2 per stack) enemies for 200% base damage every 0.5s.The Tesla Coil switches off every 10 seconds.
unlock: Deal 5000 damage in one shot.

name: Electric Boomerang
description: 15% chance on hit to fire an electric boomerang that slices through enemies, dealing 120% base damage, an additional 120% (+120% per stack) base damage per second, and stuns all enemies hit. Can strike enemies on the way back.

name: Soulbound Catalyst
description: Kills reduce equipment cooldown by 4s (+2s per stack).
unlock: Discover and activate 8 unique Newt Altars.

name: Hardlight Afterburner
description: Add +2 (+2 per stack) charges of your Utility skill. Reduces Utility skill cooldown by 33%.

name: Artifact Key
description: A stone shard with immense power.

name: Queen's Gland
description: Every 30 seconds, summon a Beetle Guard with bonus 300% damage and 100% health. Can have up to 1 (+1 per stack) Guards at a time.

name: Shatterspleen
description: Critical Strikes bleed enemies for 240% base damage. Bleeding enemies explode on death for 400% (+400% per stack) damage, plus an additional 15% (+15% per stack) of their maximum health.

name: Molten Perforator
description: 10% chance on hit to call forth 3 magma balls from an enemy, dealing 300% (+300% per stack) damage and igniting all enemies.

name: Titanic Knurl
description: Increases maximum health by 40 (+40 per stack) and base health regeneration by +1.6 hp/s (+1.6 hp/s per stack).

name: Charged Perforator
description: 10% chance on hit to do down a lightning strike, dealing 500% (+500% per stack) damage.

name: Defense Nucleus
description: Killing elite monsters spawns an Alpha Construct. Limited to 4 (+4 per stack).

name: Genesis Loop
description: Falling below 25% health causes you to explode, dealing 6000% base damage. Recharges every 30 seconds (-50% per stack).

name: Planula
description: Heal from incoming damage for 15 (+15 per stack).

name: Pearl
description: Increases maximum health by 10% (+10% per stack).

name: Empathy Cores
description: Every 30 seconds, summon two Solus Probes that gain +100% (+100% per stack) damage per ally on your team.

name: Item Scrap, Yellow
description: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.

name: Irradiant Pearl
description: Increases ALL stats by 10% (+10% per stack).

name: Mired Urn
description: While in combat, the nearest 1 (+1 per stack) enemies to you within 13m whill be "tethered" to you, dealing 100% damage per second, applying tar, and healing you for 100% of the damage dealt.

name: Little Disciple
description: Fire a tracking wisp for 300% (+300% per stack) damage.Fires every 1.6 seconds while sprinting. Fire rate increases with movement speed.

name: Halcyon Seed
description: Summon Aurelionite during the teleporter event. It has 100% (+50% per stack) damage and 100% (+100% per stack) health.

name: Safer Spaces
description: Block incoming damage once. Recharges after 15 seconds (-10% per stack). Corrupts all Tougher Times.

name: Needletick
description: 10% (+10% per stack) chance to collapse an enemy for 400% base damage. Corrupts all Tri-Tip Daggers.

name: Lost Seer's Lenses
description: Your attacks have a 0.5% (+0.5% per stack) chance to instantly kill a non-Boss enemy. Corrupts all Lens-Maker's Glasses.

name: Weeping Fungus
description: Heals for 2% (+2% per stack) of your health every second while sprinting. Corrupts all Bustling Fungi.

name: Encrusted Key
description: A hidden cache containing an item (60%/30%/10%) will appear in a random location on each stage. Opening the cache consumes this item. Corrupts all Rusted Key.

name: Polylute
description: 25% chance to fire lightning for 60% TOTAL damage up to 3 (+3 per stack) times. Corrupts all Ukuleles.

name: Singularity Band
description: Hits that deal more than 400% damage also fire a black hole that draws enemies within 15m into its center. Lasts 5 seconds before collapsing, dealing 100% (+100% per stack) TOTAL damage.Recharges every 20 seconds. Corrupts all Kjaro's Band and Runald's Band.

name: Lysate Cell
description: Add +1 (+1 per stack) charge of your Special skill. Corrupts all Fuel Cells.

name: Voidsent Flame
description: Upon hitting an enemy at or above 100% health, detonate them in a 12m (+2.4m per stack) radius burst for 260% (+156% per stack) base damage. Corrupts all Will-o'-the-wisps.

name: Plasma Shrimp
description: Gain a shield equal to 10% of your maximum health. While you have a shield, hitting an enemy fires a missile that deals 40% (+50% per stack) TOTAL damage. Corrupts all AtG Missile Mk. 1s.

name: Tentabauble
description: 5% (+5% per stack) chance on hit to root enemies for 1s (+1s per stack) Corrupts all Chronobaubles.

name: Benthic Bloom
description: Upgrades 3 (+3 per stack) randoms items to items of the next higher rarity at the start of each stage. Corrupts all 57 Leaf Clovers.

name: Pluripotent Larva
description: Upon death, this item will be consumed and you will return to life with 3 seconds of invulnerability, and all of your items that can be corrupted will be. Corrupts all Dio's Best Friends.

name: Newly Hatched Zoea
description: Every 60 (-50% per stack) seconds, gain a random Void ally. Can have up to 1 (+1 per stack) allies at a time. Corrupts all Unique Items.

name: Gesture of the Drowned
description: Reduce equipment cooldown by 50% (+15% per stack). Forces your Equipment to activate whenever it is off cooldown.
unlock: Kill 20 Hermit Crabs by chasing them off the edge of the map.

name: Focused Convergence
description: Teleporters charge 30% (+30% per stack) faster, but the size of the Teleporter zone is 50% (-50% per stack) smaller.
unlock: In 4 consecutives stages, don't leave the teleporter radius until it is fully charged.

name: Brittle Crown
description: 30% chance on hit to gain 2 (+2 per stack) gold. Scales over time. On taking damage, lose gold equal to 100% (+100% per stack) of the maximum health percentage you lost.

name: Light Flux Pauldron
description: Decrease skill cooldowns by 50% (+50% per stack). Decrease attack speed by 50% (+50% per stack).

name: Stone Flux Pauldron
description: Increase max health by 100% (+100% per stack). Reduce movement speed by 50% (+50% per stack).

name: Purity
description: All skill cooldowns are reduced by 2 (+1 per stack) seconds. All random effects are rolled +1 (+1 per stack) times for an unfavorable outcome.
unlock: Beat the game in Monsoon difficulty.

name: Shaped Glass
description: Increase base damage by 100% (+100% per stack).Reduce maximum health by 50% (+50% per stack).

name: Visions of Heresy
description: Replace your Primary Skill with Hungering Gaze. Fire a flurry of tracking shards that detonate after a delay, dealing 120% base damage. Hold up to 12 charges (+12 per stack) that reload after 2 seconds (+2 per stack).

name: Hooks of Heresy
description: Replace your Secondary Skill with Slicing Maelstrom. Charge up a projectile that deals 875% damage per second to nearby enemies, exploding after 3 seconds to deal 700% damage and root enemies for 3 (+3 per stack) seconds. Recharges after 5 (+5 per stack) seconds.
unlock: Kill 15 boss monsters in a single run.

name: Essence of Heresy
description: Replace your Special Skill with Ruin. Dealing damage adds a stack of Ruin for 10 (+10 per stack) seconds. Activating the skill detonates all Ruin stack at unlimited range, dealing 300% damage plus 120% damage per stack of Ruin. Recharges after 8 (+8 per stack) seconds.
unlock: Kill 15 boss monsters in a single run.

name: Egocentrism
description: Every 3 (-50% per stack) seconds, gain an orbiting bomb that detonates on impact for 360% damage, up to a maximum of 3 (+1 per stack) bombs. Every 60 seconds, a random item is converted into this item.

name: Beads of Fealty
description: Seems to do nothing... but...
unlock: Unlock the new zone from the "Hidden Realms" update when you obliterate with this item.

name: Strides of Heresy
description: Replace your Utility Skill with Shadowfade. Fade away, becoming intangible and gaining +30% movement speed. Heal for 25% (+25% per stack) of your maximum health. Lasts 3 (+3 per stack) seconds.
unlock: Kill 15 boss monsters in a single run.

name: Defiant Gouge
description: Using a Shrine summons enemies nearby. Scales over time.

name: Longstanding Solitude
description: On level up gain a free unlock for the next purchase (+1 per stack) but all gold is converted to experience. Anything that costs gold is increased by 50% (+50% per stack).

name: Mercurial Rachis
description: Creates a Ward of Power in a random location nearby that buffs both enemies and allies within 16m (+50% per stack), causing them to deal +50% damage.

name: Eulogy Zero
description: Items have a 5% (+5% per stack) chance to become a Lunar item instead.

name: Corpsebloom
description: Heal +100% (+100% per stack) more.All healing is applied over time. Can heal for a maximum of 10% (-50% per stack) of your health per second.

name: Transcendence
description: Convert all but 1 health into regenerating shields. Gain 50% (+25% per stack) maximum health.

name: Hellfire Tincture
description: Ignite ALL characters within 15m. Deal 5% of your maximum health/second as burning to yourself. The burn is 0.5x stronger on allies, and 24x stronger on enemies. Cooldown: 45s
unlock: Kill 15 enemies simultaneously.

name: Effigy of Grief
description: ALL characters are slowed by 50% and has their armor reduced by 20. Can place up to 5. Cooldown: 15s

name: Glowing Meteorite
description: Rain meteors from the sky, damaging ALL characters for 600% damage per blast.Last 20 seconds. Cooldown: 140s
unlock: Carry 5 Lunar items in a single run.

name: Spinel Tonic
description: Drink the Tonic, gaining a boost for 15 seconds.Increases damage by +100%.Increases attack speed by +70%.Increases armor by +20.Increases maximum health by +50%. Increases passive health regeneration by +300%. Increases movespeed by +30%.When the tonic wears off, you have 20% chance to gain a Tonic Affliction, reducing all of your stats by -5% (-5% per stack). Cooldown: 60s
unlock: Discover and enter three unique portals.

name: Preon Accumulator
description: Fires preon tendrils, zapping enemies within 35m up to 600% damage/second. On contact, detonate in an enormous 20m explosion for 4000% damage. Cooldown: 140s
unlock: Open the Timed Security Chest on Rallypoint Delta.

name: Primordial Cube
description: Fire a black hole that draws enemies within 30m into its center. Last 10 seconds. Cooldown: 60s

name: Trophy Hunter's Tricorn
description: Execute any enemy capable of spawning a unique reward, and it will drop that item. Equipment is consumed on use.

name: Blast Shower
description: Cleanse all negative effects. Includes debuffs, damage over time, and nearby projectiles. Cooldown: 20s
unlock: Die three fiery deaths.

name: Disposable Missile Launcher
description: Fire a swarm of 12 missiles that deal 12x300% damage. Cooldown: 45s

name: Ocular HUD
description: Gain +100% Critical Strike Chance for 8 seconds. Cooldown: 60s

name: Forgive Me Please
description: Throw a cursed doll out that triggers any on-kill effects you have every 1 second for 8 seconds. Cooldown: 45
unlock: Die 20 times.

name: The Back-up
description: Call 4 Strike Drones to fight for you. Last 25 seconds. Cooldown: 100s
unlock: Repair 30 drones or turrets.

name: Volcanic Egg
description: Turn into a draconic fireball for 5 seconds. Deal 500% damage on impact. Detonates at the end for 800% damage. Cooldown: 30s

name: Foreign Fruit
description: Instantly heal for 50% of your maximum health. Cooldown: 45s

name: Jade Elephant
description: Gain 500 armor for 5 seconds. Cooldown: 45s

name: Eccentric Vase
description: Create a quantum tunnel of up to 1000m in length. Lasts 30 seconds. Cooldown: 45s
unlock: Defeat the guardian of Gilded Coast without any beacons deactivating.

name: The Crowdfunder
description: Fires a continuous barrage that deals 100% damage per bullet. Costs $1 per bullet. Costs increases over time. Cooldown: 5s
unlock: Collect $30,480 total gold.

name: Goobo Jr.
description: Spawn a gummy clone that has 300% damage and 300% health. Expires in 30 seconds. Cooldown: 100s

name: Seed of Life
description: Revive dead, friendly Survivors upon activation. Dying while holding this equipment returns only you to life. Reviving gives 3s of invulnerability and consumes the equipment.
unlock: Journey to the Prime Meridian and defeat the False Son.

name: Milky Chrysalis
description: Sprout wings and fly for 15 seconds.Gain +20% movement speed for the duration. Cooldown: 60s

name: Super Massive Leech
description: Heal for 20% of the damage you deal. Lasts 8 seconds. Cooldown: 60s

name: Royal Capacitor
description: Call down a lightning strike on a targeted monster, dealing 3000% damage and stunning nearby monsters. Cooldown: 20s
unlock: Defeat the Teleporter bosses after activating 2 Shrines of the Moutain.

name: Molotov (6-Pack)
description: Throw 6 molotov cocktails that ignites enemies for 500% base damage. Each molotov leaves a burning area for 200% damage per second. Cooldown: 45s

name: Executive Card
description: Whenever you make a gold purchase, get 10% of the spent gold back. If the purchase is a multishop terminal, the other terminals will remaing open. Cooldown: 0.1s

name: Gnarled Woodsprite
description: Gain a Woodsprite follower that heals a friendly target for 10% of their maximum health instantly, then 1.5% of your maximum health every second. Activating the equipment assigns a new target, or yourself if there are no targets available. Cooldown: 15s
unlock: Fully upgrade a Shrine of the Woods.

name: Recycler
description: Transform an Item or Equipment into a different one. Can only be converted in the same tier one time. Cooldown: 45s
unlock: Destroy  20 flying rocks in Sky Meadow.

name: Sawmerang
description: Throw three large saw blades that slice through enemies for 3x400% damage. Also deals an additional 3x100% damage per second while bleeding enemies. Can strike enemies again on the way back. Cooldown: 45s

name: Radar Scanner
description: Reveal all interactables within 500m for 10 seconds. Cooldown: 45s
unlock: Collect 10 Monster or Environment Logs.

name: Gorag's Opus
description: All allies enter a frenzy for 7 seconds. Increases movement speed by 50% and attack speed by 100%. Cooldown: 45s

name: Remote Caffeinator
description: Request an Eclipse Zero Vending Machine from the UES Safe Travels. Delivery guaranteed in 5 seconds, dealing 2000% damage. Heal up to 3 targets for 25% of their maximum health. Cooldown: 60s
